name: Qinoo Quest
description:
Traverse the arctic together with your fellow Oongul! A multiplayer quest to bring your lantern to Qinoo, the God of the Arctic himself.

Pick the colour of your Oongul! Hunt down defenseless woodland creatures for food, which you can cook with the heat of your trusty lantern! Chop down trees and use the wood to create bridges across frigid waters, or to fuel the lantern! (Make sure not to leave that lantern behind-- you'll need it to both survive and achieve the true ending of the game!)

Sit back and admire the music which transforms with YOUR actions!

Truly this is a journey which stands above and beyond all others; truly this is:

"QINOO QUEST."

Notes: the 25565 box on opening is port, make sure the port is forwarded if you want to play multiplayer

Hosts can get their ip through "my ip" through google

Diversifiers:

Multiplayer

Character customization
